WorkItem.Description:
I realize this is a niche, low priority issue, but thought I'd let you know just the same.  On large, full-respec type optimizations, in which basically every slot is changed to some extent, the Print feature does not fit them all on one page, nor does it spill over to a second page.  It simply cuts off.
 
I generally only use the Batch Tools, with Fire as my primary optimization, and Arcane as secondary.  I discovered the problem when I was investigating a switch to Arcane as my primary, which necessitated a change to literally every single item, 15 in total.  When I printed the results, it managed to get 12 full items on the printed page, and clipped the rest.  I then tried printing to a PDF, which managed to get 13 full items, but still clipped the weapon and ranged slots.
 
As I said, I realize that this is a niche problem; most people will not have 13-15 slot changes on a regular basis, but I appreciate you looking into it.  I really like the Print feature, and I'm glad you added it.
WorkItem.Summary: [Base] Optimizer Results Print feature cutting off on large returns

Comments.Message: I discovered that using the setting the scale to 85-90% when printing to a PDF file will allow all 15 items to fit on one page, but no amount of rescaling will allow more items to fit when actually printing to my printer.  Rescaling reduces the size of the image on the page, but the list is still cut off at 12-13 items.
